code: export var ActionTypes={STORE_USER:"STORE_USER",STORE_CAMPAIGN:"STORE_CAMPAIGN",LOAD_CAMPAIGN:"LOAD_CAMPAIGN",GET_ALL_EMAIL_LIST:"GET_ALL_EMAIL_LIST",STORE_ALL_EMAIL_LIST:"STORE_ALL_EMAIL_LIST",GET_ALL_CAMPAIGNS:"GET_ALL_CAMPAIGNS",STORE_ALL_CAMPAIGNS:"STORE_ALL_CAMPAIGNS",EMAIL_LIST_ADDED:"EMAIL_LIST_ADDED",CAMPAIGNS_ADDED:"CAMPAIGNS_ADDED",DELETE_CAMPAIGN:"DELETE_CAMPAIGN",DELETE_EMAIL_LIST:"DELETE_EMAIL_LIST",CAMPAIGN_UPDATED:"CAMPAIGN_UPDATED"};export var storeUserRequest=function storeUserRequest(payload){return{type:ActionTypes.STORE_USER,payload:payload};};export var storeCampaign=function storeCampaign(payload){return{type:ActionTypes.STORE_CAMPAIGN,payload:payload};};export var loadCampaign=function loadCampaign(payload){return{type:ActionTypes.LOAD_CAMPAIGN,payload:payload};};export var getAllEmailList=function getAllEmailList(id){return{type:ActionTypes.GET_ALL_EMAIL_LIST,payload:id};};export var getAllCampaigns=function getAllCampaigns(id){return{type:ActionTypes.GET_ALL_CAMPAIGNS,payload:id};};export var storeAllEmailList=function storeAllEmailList(emailist){return{type:ActionTypes.STORE_ALL_EMAIL_LIST,payload:emailist};};export var storeAllCampaigns=function storeAllCampaigns(campaigns){return{type:ActionTypes.STORE_ALL_CAMPAIGNS,payload:campaigns};};export var addCampaign=function addCampaign(){return{type:ActionTypes.CAMPAIGNS_ADDED};};export var addEmailList=function addEmailList(data){return{type:ActionTypes.EMAIL_LIST_ADDED,payload:data};};export var deleteCamp=function deleteCamp(id){return{type:ActionTypes.DELETE_CAMPAIGN,payload:id};};export var deleteEmailList=function deleteEmailList(id){return{type:ActionTypes.DELETE_EMAIL_LIST,payload:id};};export var updateCampaign=function updateCampaign(userId){return{type:ActionTypes.CAMPAIGN_UPDATED,payload:userId};};
